Reviews.Title: Does NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Mike Dunn "portrait"
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great product if it worked, but it doesn't.First the picture is great but the viewing angle is too narrow, only good for far away. Second the motion detector only works once, then the unit is off. This wouldn't be so bad except that when you press the button to activate the motion detector it takes two seconds to activate, so if you are in the line of site when you activate after two second it records you for the next couple of minutes and then turns off. I managed to put it around a wall and activate it by reaching around but then comes the last worst part. The battery lasts only about 2 hours and the unit shuts off, and here is the kicker, if you don't turn the unit off manually before battery dies it looses the file it recorded.So unless you can do a disappearing act to activate this and you know exactly when you record what you want and get to turn off this unit it is totally worthless.Look elsewhere for a hidden camera.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work for  what it's made for
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I got this to put in my office to see if people were taking items from there. It is huge and the camera is huge. it's not a pinhole like you would think. plus it has a light on the side of the device. What's the point of a hidden camera if it stands out?

Reviews.Title: Motion-activated Clothes Hook Hidden Camera Motion Detection Security DVR
Reviews.Author: Othyneil Pinder
Reviews.Content: The Motion-activated Clothes Hook Hidden Camera Motion Detection Security DVR did not work even though i followed instruction. The montion detection portion never worked. I was also sent an extra one with the on/off power switch not working. Was not a good buy, appears both of them malfunction.

Reviews.Title: Don't let the '2x' fool you...
Reviews.Author: E Price
Reviews.Content: The product itself is great. Good video quality, etc. It would have gotten 3 stars, except that there was only one in the package. The picture with the posting clearly indicates that there should have been 2. In the description it says "2 pcs Motion-activated..."I don't know if it is the same from other sellers, but I would suggest contacting before buying.
